ygData.subject: Dark Reaver & Sk Swords
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok guys heres some info you might want. The Dark Reaver is found in Lower Guk, be lvl 30+ to start going there..Also there are weapons not yet implemented in
ygData.messageBody:
Ok guys heres some info you might want. The Dark Reaver is found in Lower
Guk, be lvl 30+ to start going there..Also there are weapons not yet
implemented in the game...eventually sk's will get a weapon known as Soul
Flayer...name might be changed AGAIN. In early beta the Dark Reaver was MUCH
MUCH MUCH MUCH better than it is now...now it kinda sucks...you used to be
able to stay alive just on it's lifetap abilities which are now just a 20 str
spell...might give you guys more info later...

Ranak Darksoul
Fennin Ro
